main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in South Bend, Indiana in 1957.
interesting points: The witness observed a bright, elongated object in the sky traveling at a high rate of speed, estimated to be 300-400 feet in length.
The witness reported seeing glowing objects that appeared to move in a smooth, fish-like motion, with a beautiful, gossamer-like appearance.
An officer reported observing a large, bright, round object that was initially stationary, then suddenly took off at a high rate of speed, changing direction several times before disappearing.
The witness described seeing an object approach from the northwest, pass overhead, and then suddenly increase speed and disappear, estimating it was traveling at around 600 mph.
The witness reported seeing multiple objects, one of which was changing shape and emitting small red lights, while another remained stationary for over 30 minutes.
sighted object: bright, elongated objects; glowing, smooth-moving objects; large, bright, round objects
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph of an unidentified object
